title: New blood moon meta team
body:
So I was thinking, there could be a new blood moon meta team. Just an idea, but here are the champs that could be done:

Blood moon {{champion:30}}  (mid)

blood moon {{champion:120}}  (jg)

blood moon {{champion:238}}  (top) Also there's a blood moon Shen so it would make sense

 blood moon {{champion:110}} / another adc

blood moon {{champion:143}} / another ap supp

Just an idea, but blood moon Zed would be cool cause there are only 2 skins and his definitely one of the most popular champs.

replies.body: I know. Im saying there could still be another. idk just really love the blood moon skins
generally when they do a set they only make 5 skins and then move on.

No we don't need another, some skin sets are meant to be just one team of skins of that type, why would anyone want to have another team. however it would be interesting to see a blood moon team vs another one with different blood moon set. but i have doubts riot will follow up on this. they are pretty busy trying to keep millions of players happy and entertained by this game (maybe in the very distant future it will become a thing)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=mBhsnEIm,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-29T01:21:33.602+0000)
>
> No we don't need another, some skin sets are meant to be just one team of skins of that type, why would anyone want to have another team. however it would be interesting to see a blood moon team vs another one with different blood moon set. but i have doubts riot will follow up on this. they are pretty busy trying to keep millions of players happy and entertained by this game (maybe in the very distant future it will become a thing)

twas just an idea

But there's already a blood moon team. And it's already strong AF.

TOP: Shen
Jungle: Elise
Mid: Akali
ADC: Kalista
Support: Thresh
